SEARCH
Package a2

Class Student_Course

java.lang.Object
a2.Student
a2.Student_Course
public class Student_Course extends Student
The 'Student_Course' class is a sub class of Student. It has information of the a Coursework student. A Unit_Course class, a subclass of Unit Class, is an attribute of Student_Course class and contains the Student academic information

NOTE: This class is meant to be instantiated and to be used with Unit_Course class as it requires to use the information from the class.

Author:
yeojustin

  • Field Details

    • unit

      private Unit_Course unit
      This is a Unit_Course object that contains the marks information of a student It serves as an attribute to the Student_Course class. It is declared to be instantiated within the Student_Course class.

  • Method Details

    • setUnit

      public void setUnit(Unit_Course unit)
      Sets the Unit_Course object representing the course the student is enrolled in.

      Pre-condition: Unit_Course class

      Post-condition: Sets the Unit_Course object.

      Parameters:
      unit - the Unit_Course object representing the Course.

    • getUnit

      public Unit_Course getUnit()
      Getter method returns the Unit_Course object representing the course the student is enrolled in.

      Pre-condition: Unit_Course class set and instantiated

      Post-condition: Returns the Unit_Course object

      Returns:
      the Unit_Course object representing the course

    • reportGrade

      public void reportGrade()
      Method display out the student's information and the grade for the course they are enrolled in. If the student is not enrolled in a course, prints out "No unit information." Method is override from Student super class

      Pre-condition:

      • 'reportGrade' method in Super Class needs to be used
      • 'setUnit' method needs to be called and parsed
      • 'displayStudentInfo' method in Super Class needs to be called

      Post-condition: Displays the Student information from Super Class and Student marks information from Unit_Course class

      Overrides:
      reportGrade in class Student

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Method that overrides toString method from Object class This method is a string representation of the Student_Course object. Includes the student's information and the information for the course they are enrolled in. Precondition:
      • Student_Class object is initialised at the Constructor
      • Unit_Course class needs to be set

      Post-condition: A string representation of the Student_Course object of information from Student Class, UnitID, UnitLevel, Assignment 1 and 2 marks and exam marks from the Unit_Course class

      Overrides:
      toString in class Student
      Returns:
      a string representation of the Student_Course object

    • run

      public static void run()
      Runs a test of the Student_Course class. Creates a Student_Course object and instantiate Unit_Course object as an attribute and prints out their grade before and after enrolling in a course.
